Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class PlayersManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.PlayersManager
public class PlayersManager extends Object
This Class manages players during the match. Gives methods for modify SchoolBoards and Player hands

    • calculateClockwiseOrder

      public void calculateClockwiseOrder()
      Calculate clockwise order starting from playerOrderIndex[0]. Ex: 3 2 0 1 --> 3 0 1 2

    • calculatePlayerOrder

      public void calculatePlayerOrder()
      Calculates players' order based on the assistant card they played. If they played the same assistant card, goes first the one who played it.
